plays.text: Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Eric Desjardins and Mark Recchi
Penalty to Paul Ranheim 2 minutes for High Sticking Sami Salo
Penalty to Donald Brashear 2 minutes for Holding Mike Fisher
Goal scored by Martin Havlat unassisted
